verses.verse: Now Korah, <WH7141> the son <WH1121> of Izhar, <WH3324> the son <WH1121> of Kohath, <WH6955> the son <WH1121> of Levi, <WH3878> and Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram, <WH48> the sons <WH1121> of Eliab, <WH446> and On, <WH203> the son <WH1121> of Peleth, <WH6431> sons <WH1121> of Reuben, <WH7205> took <WH3947> men:

And they rose <WH6965> up before <WH6440> Moses, <WH4872> with certain <WH582> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> princes <WH5387> of the assembly, <WH5712> famous <WH7148> in the congregation, <WH4150> men <WH582> of renown: <WH8034>

And they gathered <WH6950> themselves together against <WH5921> Moses <WH4872> and against <WH5921> Aaron, <WH175> and said <WH559> to them, You take too much <WH7227> on you, seeing <WH3588> all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> are holy, <WH6918> every <WH3605> one of them, and the LORD <WH3068> is among <WH8432> them: why <WH4069> then lift <WH5375> you up yourselves above <WH5921> the congregation <WH6951> of the LORD? <WH3068>
And when Moses <WH4872> heard <WH8085> it, he fell <WH5307> on his face: <WH6440>

And he spoke <WH1696> to Korah <WH7141> and to all <WH3605> his company, <WH5712> saying, <WH559> Even to morrow <WH1242> the LORD <WH3068> will show <WH3045> who <WH853> <WH834> are his, and who <WH853> is holy; <WH6918> and will cause him to come <WH7126> near <WH7126> to him: even him whom <WH834> he has chosen <WH977> will he cause to come <WH7126> near <WH7126> to him.
This <WH2063> do; <WH6213> Take <WH3947> you censers, <WH4289> Korah, <WH7141> and all <WH3605> his company; <WH5712>

And put <WH5414> fire <WH784> therein, <WH2004> and put <WH7760> incense <WH7004> in them before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> to morrow: <WH4279> and it shall be that the man <WH376> whom <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> does choose, <WH977> he shall be holy: <WH6918> you take too much <WH7227> on you, you sons <WH1121> of Levi. <WH3878>
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to Korah, <WH7141> Hear, <WH8085> I pray <WH4994> you, you sons <WH1121> of Levi: <WH3878>

Seems it but a small <WH4592> thing to you, that the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> has separated <WH914> you from the congregation <WH5712> of Israel, <WH3478> to bring <WH7126> you near <WH7138> to himself to do <WH5647> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH4908> of the LORD, <WH3068> and to stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> the congregation <WH5712> to minister <WH8334> to them?
And he has brought <WH7126> you near <WH7138> to him, and all <WH3605> your brothers <WH251> the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> with you: and seek <WH1245> you the priesthood <WH3550> also? <WH1571>

For which cause <WH3651> both you and all <WH3605> your company <WH5712> are gathered <WH3259> together against <WH5921> the LORD: <WH3068> and what <WH4100> is Aaron, <WH175> that you murmur <WH3885> against <WH5921> him?
And Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> to call <WH7121> Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram, <WH48> the sons <WH1121> of Eliab: <WH446> which said, <WH559> We will not come <WH5927> up:

Is it a small <WH4592> thing that you have brought <WH5927> us up out of a land <WH776> that flows <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey, <WH1706> to kill <WH4191> us in the wilderness, <WH4057> except <WH3588> you make yourself altogether <WH1571> a prince <WH8323> over <WH5921> us?

Moreover <WH637> you have not brought <WH935> us into a land <WH776> that flows <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey, <WH1706> or given <WH5414> us inheritance <WH5159> of fields <WH7704> and vineyards: <WH3754> will you put <WH5365> out the eyes <WH5869> of these <WH1992> men? <WH582> we will not come <WH5927> up.

And Moses <WH4872> was very <WH3966> wroth, <WH2734> and said <WH559> to the LORD, <WH3068> Respect <WH6437> not you their offering: <WH4503> I have not taken <WH5375> one <WH259> ass <WH2543> from them, neither <WH3808> have I hurt <WH7489> one <WH259> of them.
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to Korah, <WH7141> Be you and all <WH3605> your company <WH5712> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> you, and they, and Aaron, <WH175> to morrow: <WH4279>

And take <WH3947> every man <WH376> his censer, <WH4289> and put <WH5414> incense <WH7004> in them, and bring <WH7126> you before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> every man <WH376> his censer, <WH4289> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> censers; <WH4289> you also, and Aaron, <WH175> each <WH376> of you his censer. <WH4289>

And they took <WH3947> every man <WH376> his censer, <WH4289> and put <WH5414> fire <WH784> in them, and laid <WH7760> incense <WH7004> thereon, <WH5921> and stood <WH5975> in the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> with Moses <WH4872> and Aaron. <WH175>

And Korah <WH7141> gathered <WH6950> all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> against <WH5921> them to the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150> and the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> to all <WH3605> the congregation. <WH5712>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> and to Aaron, <WH175> saying, <WH559>
Separate <WH914> yourselves from among <WH8432> this <WH2063> congregation, <WH5712> that I may consume <WH3615> them in a moment. <WH7281>

And they fell <WH5307> on their faces, <WH6440> and said, <WH559> O God, <WH410> the God <WH430> of the spirits <WH7307> of all <WH3605> flesh, <WH1320> shall one <WH259> man <WH376> sin, <WH2398> and will you be wroth <WH7107> with all <WH3605> the congregation? <WH5712>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
Speak <WH1696> to the congregation, <WH5712> saying, <WH559> Get <WH5927> you up from about <WH5439> the tabernacle <WH4908> of Korah, <WH7141> Dathan, <WH1885> and Abiram. <WH48>
And Moses <WH4872> rose <WH6965> up and went <WH3212> to Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram; <WH48> and the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> followed <WH3212> <WH310> him.

And he spoke <WH1696> to the congregation, <WH5712> saying, <WH559> Depart, <WH5493> I pray <WH4994> you, from the tents <WH168> of these <WH428> wicked <WH7563> men, <WH582> and touch <WH5060> nothing <WH408> <WH3605> of their's, <WH1992> lest <WH6435> you be consumed <WH5595> in all <WH3605> their sins. <WH2403>

So they got <WH5927> up from the tabernacle <WH4908> of Korah, <WH7141> Dathan, <WH1885> and Abiram, <WH48> on <WH5921> every <WH376> side: <WH5439> and Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48> came <WH3318> out, and stood <WH5324> in the door <WH6607> of their tents, <WH168> and their wives, <WH802> and their sons, <WH1121> and their little <WH2945> children. <WH2945>

And Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> Hereby <WH2063> you shall know <WH3045> that the LORD <WH3068> has sent <WH7971> me to do <WH6213> all <WH3605> these <WH428> works; <WH4639> for I have not done them of my own mind. <WH3820>

If <WH518> these <WH428> men die <WH4191> the common death <WH4194> of all <WH3605> men, <WH120> or <WH176> if they be visited <WH6485> after the visitation <WH6486> of all <WH3605> men; <WH120> then the LORD <WH3068> has not sent <WH7971> me.

But if <WH518> the LORD <WH3068> make <WH1254> a new <WH1278> thing, and the earth <WH127> open <WH6475> her mouth, <WH6310> and swallow <WH1104> them up, with all <WH3605> that appertain to them, and they go <WH3381> down <WH3381> quick <WH2416> into the pit; <WH7585> then you shall understand <WH3045> that these men <WH582> have provoked <WH5006> the LORD. <WH3068>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, as he had made an end <WH3615> of speaking <WH1696> all <WH3605> these <WH428> words, <WH1697> that the ground <WH127> split <WH1234> asunder that was under <WH8478> them:

And the earth <WH776> opened <WH6605> her mouth, <WH6310> and swallowed <WH1104> them up, and their houses, <WH1004> and all <WH3605> the men <WH120> that appertained to Korah, <WH7141> and all <WH3605> their goods. <WH7399>

They, and all <WH3605> that appertained to them, went <WH3381> down <WH3381> alive <WH2416> into the pit, <WH7585> and the earth <WH776> closed <WH3680> on them: and they perished <WH6> from among <WH8432> the congregation. <WH6951>
And all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> that were round <WH5439> about them fled <WH5127> at the cry <WH6963> of them: for they said, <WH559> Lest <WH6435> the earth <WH776> swallow <WH1104> us up also.
And there came <WH3318> out a fire <WH784> from the LORD, <WH3068> and consumed <WH398> the two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> men <WH376> that offered <WH7126> incense. <WH7004>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH559> to Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest, <WH3548> that he take <WH7311> up the censers <WH4289> out of the burning, <WH8316> and scatter <WH2219> you the fire <WH784> yonder; <WH1973> for they are hallowed. <WH6942>

The censers <WH4289> of these <WH428> sinners <WH2400> against their own souls, <WH5315> let them make them broad <WH7555> plates <WH6341> for a covering <WH6826> of the altar: <WH4196> for they offered <WH7126> them before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> therefore they are hallowed: <WH6942> and they shall be a sign <WH226> to the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548> took <WH3947> the brazen <WH5178> censers, <WH4289> with which <WH834> they that were burnt <WH8313> had offered; <WH7126> and they were made broad <WH7554> plates for a covering <WH6826> of the altar: <WH4196>

To be a memorial <WH2146> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> that no <WH3808> stranger, <WH376> <WH2114> which <WH834> is not of the seed <WH2233> of Aaron, <WH175> come <WH7126> near <WH7126> to offer incense <WH7004> before <WH6440> the LORD; <WH3068> that he be not as Korah, <WH7141> and as his company: <WH5712> as the LORD <WH3068> said <WH1696> to him by the hand <WH3027> of Moses. <WH4872>

But on <WH5921> the morrow <WH4283> all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> murmured <WH3885> against <WH5921> Moses <WH4872> and against <WH5921> Aaron, <WH175> saying, <WH559> You have killed <WH4191> the people <WH5971> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, when the congregation <WH5712> was gathered <WH6950> against <WH5921> Moses <WH4872> and against <WH5921> Aaron, <WH175> that they looked <WH6437> toward <WH413> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150> and, behold, <WH2009> the cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> it, and the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> appeared. <WH7200>
And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> came <WH935> before <WH413> <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
Get <WH7426> you up from among <WH8432> this <WH2063> congregation, <WH5712> that I may consume <WH3615> them as in a moment. <WH7281> And they fell <WH5307> on their faces. <WH6440>

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to Aaron, <WH175> Take <WH3947> a censer, <WH4289> and put <WH5414> fire <WH784> therein <WH5921> from off <WH5921> the altar, <WH4196> and put <WH7760> on <WH5921> incense, <WH7004> and go <WH3212> quickly <WH4120> to the congregation, <WH5712> and make an atonement <WH3722> for them: for there is wrath <WH7110> gone <WH3318> out from the LORD; <WH3068> the plague <WH5063> is begun. <WH2490>

And Aaron <WH175> took <WH3947> as Moses <WH4872> commanded, <WH1696> and ran <WH7323> into <WH413> the middle <WH8432> of the congregation; <WH6951> and, behold, <WH2009> the plague <WH5063> was begun <WH2490> among the people: <WH5971> and he put <WH5414> on <WH5921> incense, <WH7004> and made an atonement <WH3722> for the people. <WH5971>
And he stood <WH5975> between <WH996> the dead <WH4191> and the living; <WH2416> and the plague <WH4046> was stayed. <WH6113>

Now they that died <WH4191> in the plague <WH4046> were fourteen <WH702> <WH7657> thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred, <WH3967> beside <WH905> them that died <WH4191> about <WH5921> the matter <WH1697> of Korah. <WH7141>
And Aaron <WH175> returned <WH7725> to Moses <WH4872> to the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150> and the plague <WH4046> was stayed. <WH6113>
